movies.title: The Frozen Ground
movies.plot: An Alaska State Trooper partners with a young woman who escaped the clutches of serial killer Robert Hansen to bring the murderer to justice. Based on actual events.

events.title: Cindy Paulson escapes from killer Robert Hansen

movies.title: Lone Survivor
movies.plot: Four Navy SEALs on a covert mission to neutralize a high-level Taliban operative must make an impossible moral decision in the mountains of Afghanistan that leads them into an enemy ambush. As they confront unthinkable odds, the SEALs must find reserves of strength and resilience to fight to the finish.
movies.awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 6 wins & 14 nominations.

events.title: four Navy SEALs are inserted deep into Afghanistan

movies.title: Empire State
movies.plot: After failing to get into the police academy, Chris Potamitis settles for a security guard job with an armoured truck company. After he makes the mistake of mentioning the company's lax security to his best friend, He's unwittingly drawn into an elaborate scheme to rob the abundant amounts of cash being stored on their premisesâ€”resulting in the largest cash heist in U.S.history.

events.title: Christos Potamitis helps in an armed robbery
